messages.subject: pass ressource path to doc generation
messages.body:
so that relative paths can be resolved correctly bu vue-doc-gen

fix https://github.com/sumcumo/nuxt-styleguide/issues/5

messages.subject: add option to configure the order of categories
order route entries by category and name
re-use same watcher for multiple custom folders
messages.body: in order to hopefully dont cause an segmentation fault again

messages.subject: use latest version of rxjs
messages.body:
and also stop using extendRoutes callback
(seems not to work as expected in nuxt@2)

messages.subject: add import and meta mappers
messages.body:
these can be used to use a different file or attach loaders for the route component import
and also add meta informations to the route

BREAKGIN CHANGE:
transform api has been removed in favour of custom inline loaders
migration: rewrite transformers to webpack loaders and apply these using mapImport

messages.subject: use new options API of nuxt@2
messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE:
incompatible with nuxt@1

messages.subject: use scss variables instead of css variables
messages.body: because i have no idea how to configure postcss in nuxt@2

messages.subject: do not delay initial build in dev mode
messages.body:
but do a direct rebuild instead

 - should be faster because custom folder filters and maps are executed parallel to initial build
   rebuild then uses cache from initial build
 - this feels a lot faster because we are not blocking the initial build anymore

messages.subject: use latest tec (nuxt@2 and nuxt-custom-route-folder@3)
messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE:
nuxt@1.x is not supported anymore. Please update to nuxt@2 in order to use this package

messages.subject: fix: re-use same watcher for multiple custom folders
messages.body: in order to hopefully dont cause an segmentation fault again

messages.subject: fix: use latest version of rxjs
messages.body:
and also stop using extendRoutes callback
(seems not to work as expected in nuxt@2)

messages.subject: feat: add import and meta mappers
messages.body:
these can be used to use a different file or attach loaders for the route component import
and also add meta informations to the route

BREAKGIN CHANGE:
transform api has been removed in favour of custom inline loaders
migration: rewrite transformers to webpack loaders and apply these using mapImport

messages.subject: fix: use new options API of nuxt@2
messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE:
incompatible with nuxt@1

messages.subject: fix: use scss variables instead of css variables
messages.body: because i have no idea how to configure postcss in nuxt@2

messages.subject: feat: support options by global vueMarkdownComponentLoader
messages.body: in order to enable complex options used by inline loaders

messages.subject: support options by global vueMarkdownComponentLoader
messages.body: in order to enable complex options used by inline loaders

messages.subject: require extendRoutes option
messages.body:
instead of hooking into nuxt

and also add withOptions hoc

BREAKING CHNAGE:
extendRoutes option must now be passed from parent module

messages.subject: delay initial buffer for 250
messages.body: in oder to fight a unindentified race condition

messages.subject: delay closing of watcher and observable in non-watch mode
delay final resolve for a tick
messages.body: in order to prevent some unknown race-condition from blocking the whole module

messages.subject: handle initial add batch in parallel
observe passed globs
messages.body: insted of abserving whole src folder and filtering later on

messages.subject: add default value for layout option
introduce config for iconRoute and iconFolder
use / root route for styleguide
messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE:
Standalone usage is the default mode of the styleguide
This means: all other routes of the project are discarded and the styleguide
renders directly on the entry route of the route

If you previously used the default value "/styleguide", you should
now manually set it in the configuration

messages.subject: rename "variables" to "design-tokens"
messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE
Not all sass variables are atomic and can be treated as design tokens.
Therefore the folder previosly named "variables" is renamed to "design-tokens"
and the configuration for the folder name has changed from "variablesName" to
"designTokenName".

Migration: you should rename the "variables" folder to "design-tokens"
You could also set the configuration of "designTokenName" to "variables" (not recommended)
If you allready had a custom "variablesName" configured, change the config key
to "designTokenName"

messages.subject: introduce importFrom option
messages.body: and set default to "package"

messages.subject: ensure empty extend value is treated correctly
add nuxt default options to config
make sidebar light and create own nav stylesheet
use importName to create import statements
introduce transform hack to demo fixed elements
introduce a better way of displaying tokens
render index routes on category headlines
messages.body: and hide icon nav

messages.subject: do not require tags in tags renderer
introduce icon grid and refactor some views
introduce frame to single icon view
rename variabeles renderer to designTokens
messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE:
The rendering system is now supposed to use `designTokens.vue` instead of `variables.vue`

messages.subject: use backlink instead of custom link
use absolute paths for back links
use slot instead of doc prop to get content for doc view
do not break when no docs have been parsed
render component info
messages.body: like props, methods, tags etc.

messages.subject: adapt renaming of docs to description
move index page into pages dir
messages.body: appliance to new nuxt-styleguide api

messages.subject: support data in component states
messages.body:
in oder to allow demo events

also support js object notation

messages.subject: update to latest version of nuxt-custom-route-folder
update to latest version of nuxt-styleguide-renderer-default
expose importName to renderer
messages.body: so that the renderer can create correct import statements

messages.subject: update to latest versions of nuxt-custom-route-folder and nuxt-styleguide-renderer-default
base64 encode route meta info
messages.body: in order to prevent corruption by other modules that tinker with the route name

messages.subject: re-add path prefix feature
messages.body: was accitentally removed with move to custom-route-folder module

messages.subject: pin depdendency to latest default renderer
pin to latest default renderer version
apply layout option to rendered pages
use renderer page folders as category
use nuxt-custom-route-folder to generate additional routes
introduce config for iconRoute and iconFolder
pick up icons and render them in navigation
rename "variables" to "design-tokens"
messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE
Not all sass variables are atomic and can be treated as design tokens.
Therefore the folder previosly named "variables" is renamed to "design-tokens"
and the configuration for the folder name has changed from "variablesName" to
"designTokenName".

Migration: you should rename the "variables" folder to "design-tokens"
You could also set the configuration of "designTokenName" to "variables" (not recommended)
If you allready had a custom "variablesName" configured, change the config key
to "designTokenName"

messages.subject: require latest versions of internal dependencies
use component display name instead of file name
do not render markdown of empty description
do not strip leading slash in basepath
support router.base option with absolute paths
ensure docs do not conflict with pages
also allow vue files for docs
use extendBuild method instead of hacking webpack config
stop assuming existing tags for variables files
make applyMarkdownToDocs reusable by future proxy creators
internally add .comp suffix to proxy files
messages.body: in order to prevent collisions with other proxy types

messages.subject: handle case when component has no slot
handle cases where $router is not initialized
do not break when no pages exist
do not resolve default prop values manually
messages.body: this fixes an issue where function props with default value break the preview

messages.subject: use prepare script instead of prepublish
messages.body: for npm@5 compat

messages.subject: apply markdown to all component info descriptions
generate docs from component files
messages.body: using vue-docgen-api <3

messages.subject: provide $styleguide global
messages.body: containing meta informations such as project name, version and routes

messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE:
Standalone usage is the default mode of the styleguide
This means: all other routes of the project are discarded and the styleguide
renders directly on the entry route of the route

If you previously used the default value "/styleguide", you should
now manually set it in the configuration

messages.subject: rename "variables" to "design-tokens"
messages.body:
BREAKING CHANGE
Not all sass variables are atomic and can be treated as design tokens.
Therefore the folder previosly named "variables" is renamed to "design-tokens"
and the configuration for the folder name has changed from "variablesName" to
"designTokenName".

Migration: you should rename the "variables" folder to "design-tokens"
You could also set the configuration of "designTokenName" to "variables" (not recommended)
If you allready had a custom "variablesName" configured, change the config key
to "designTokenName"
